attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i call for a Public Enquiry.
Building Regulations are not been policed.
Self Regulation for the installation of Windows
is not enforceable by Law, under Self Regulation.
It has been seen many times, the uk building regulations are 
been ignored, and Leaving Properties in danger of Collapse.
When Companies such as FENSA and Anglian Home Improvements
Wilfully and Deliberately Delay  inspections, of over 2 years, in an attempt to 
avoid Prosecutions, after stating Building Regulations do not apply 
to the installation of new Windows.
When i stated to the British Board of Agreement who carry
out Inspections on Behalf of FENSA, I am making, it public
after leaving my home in danger of Collapse, and falsifying Documents
They then threaten me, in Writing they will sue, me, if i contact the BBC or the 
European Commissioner.
Trading Standards refuse to investigate, same with Consumer Direct.
Building Control, cannot prosecute, because the time limit had passed.
This leaves the Consumer in a legal loop hole, where no one can help.
Not even the Laws set up by the Government Can help those Families affected.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
